commit message: 'Close chat' option moved down in chat overflow menu. #433
Message Carbons disabled by default and marked as unstable #439
Chat 'show background' preference option.  #438 Disabling this option should avoid crash #417
New chat background: smaller resolution, alpha not used. #438  Should fix crash #417
Chat message layout changed to better support RTL languages. #234
Chat messages scroll corrected: chat was not scrolled down for new messages in some situations.
MessageManager removed active chats on account disable. #441
If chat opened via shortcut widget, adapter created again, 'intent' chat replaced.  Fix #108
